qas.question: In what year was Jaipal again soundly defeated by the Muslims?
Where was the location of the Shahi defeat by the Muslims?
What was Jaipal action after his last defeat?
Upon what did Jaipal's subjects think he brought disaster?
Who was the ruler of Ghazni?

context: However, the army was hopeless in battle against the western forces, particularly against the young <a4_0>Mahmud of Ghazni<a4_0/>. In the year <a0_0>1001<a0_0/>, soon after Sultan Mahmud came to power and was occupied with the Qarakhanids north of the Hindu Kush, Jaipal attacked Ghazni once more and upon suffering yet another defeat by the powerful Ghaznavid forces, near present-day Peshawar. After the <a1_0>Battle of Peshawar<a1_0/>, he <a2_0>committed suicide<a2_0/> because his subjects thought he had brought disaster and disgrace to the <a3_0>Shahi dynasty<a3_0/>.
